amendment.description: Amendment increases the Army's personnel account by $98 million to provide for domestic travel and transportation costs under the Rest and Recuperation program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Army's personnel funding account by $98 million with the intention of extending the Rest and Recuperation program to include domestic travel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ramstad amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Ramstad.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ramstad amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
